title: /hat /NICK 权限怎么把玩家下了
author: qq2415786013
txt_content: /hat /NICK 权限怎么把玩家下了   求解决   下他们权限

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
qq2415786013 发表于 2015-7-10 15:23
不可以 我试过了 没用好像
那你就输入mangaddp Buildet -essentials.hat给玩家组负权，nick权限同理

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
mangdelp Builder essentials.hat
mangdelp Builder essentias.nick
两个指令去除玩家组的权限即可

replies.author: qq2415786013
replies.txt_content:
